评论详情: This dress is great for work! It’s not too short or too long. It’s stretchy but more cottony feeling. Easy to dress up or wear with some white sneakers. I like that there is a bit of a bunched up area along the seam, it makes it super forgiving even on days you feel bloated.

评论概述: Perfect fit! This dress was fire!
评论详情: This dress was perfect.  5'3", 125-130#, 34D.... size Small.  So many compliments on this dress.  Fabric is a stretchy t-shirt material but not super thin.  I'm not sure why it says frequently returned item - I'm ordering at least one more in a different color!  Great dress for a night out in heels or you can dress it down with sandals.

I ordered a black and a red version of this dress and they were both totally different! The red was the same as the picture with the "v" in front and was double lined and it a nice dress. The black, however, was not the same dress at all! It was very very thin, a ribbed material, no tag whatsoever, and did not have the "v" in front and was much more ruched. If the dress is like the red version I would recommend it but size down. I got a medium and it was too big. The black dress Ultimately is okay just not at all what I was expecting and would definitely be better for summer.

评论概述: Using lower quality fabric than in the past
评论详情: I’m so disappointed. As you can see from the photo above, I’ve owned this dress for a couple of years and it was starting to look worn so I ordered a new one - the exact same dress. The new dress is much thinner, lower quality fabric and just doesn’t hang the same. Such a bummer - this was my favorite dress, and the color is gorgeous. I would happily pay an extra couple of dollars to get the same exact dress in the good quality fabric. Unfortunately, I will not be buying from this brand again, which is a bummer because I have bought a lot of dresses from them in the past.
